channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - booleans

item.title: A SELinux policy for incron: default set
item.description:
I finished the last post a bit with a cliffhanger as incrond is still not working properly, and we got a few denials that needed to be resolved; here they are again for your convenience:

type=AVC msg=audit(1368734110.912:28353): avc:  denied  { getattr } for  pid=9716 comm="incrond â€¦
